# nextjs/no-before-interactive-script-outside-document <Badge type="info" text="Correctness" />

<div class="rule-meta">
</div>

### What it does

Prevent usage of `next/script`'s `beforeInteractive` strategy outside of `pages/_document.js`.

### Why is this bad?
